title: 20060 ROSEMONT AVE, DETROIT 3 BED 1 BATH 1436 SF HOUSE FOR RENT.
posting_body: 20060 ROSEMONT AVE, DETROIT 3 BED 1 BATH 1436 SF HOUSE FOR RENT.
MUST SEE HOUSE THAT HAS BEEN COMPLETELY REMODELED THIS YEAR.

1.5 CAR GARAGE, REAR COVERED PAYIO FOR SUMMERTIME.
CLOSE TO SOUTHFIELD, DOWNTOWN, SHOPPING, DINING, ETC.
